trends: There have been no other sightings in Grand Bay
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Strange red orb and a bit of a light show.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was out on my deck smoking and looked out towards I-10. Suddenly a red orb shot up from below the tree line, hovered for a few seconds then a bright ring of red light emiited from it and it shot straight up and out of sight. A few seconds later my home shook but there was no sound at all. Earlier there was a helicopter in the area, have been helicopters in the skies here for the last few weeks. I don't know what to make of it but it was impressive to say the least.
